name: DateAndTimeSettings
desc: Constraints on the device’s date and time settings.

items.name: var requireAutomaticDateAndTime: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to prevent the user from changing their device’s date and time.

items.name: static let requireAutomaticDateAndTime: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata for the constraint that configures the date and time setting.
